General.Name: Trias Sentosa Tbk
General.Description: PT Trias Sentosa Tbk operates as a flexible packaging film manufacturer in Indonesia, Japan, the rest of Asia, the United States, Australia, Europe, and Africa. The company manufactures and sells biaxially oriented polypropylene (BOPP) and biaxially oriented polyester (BOPET) films and plastics; and offers solutions of plastic packaging manufacturing products. Its BOPP and BOPET products include printing and lamination, overwrap, anti-fog, matte, pearlized, white opaque, label, metallized, coated, and thermal film products. The company's products are used for food packaging; tobacco and box overwraps; anti-fog bags for vegetables, fresh fruits, and salad; paper look packaging and paper lamination; clear, white, and metallized label packaging; and ice cream, candy, and soap packaging. It is also involved in investment, trading, import, export, distribution, and other activities. PT Trias Sentosa Tbk was founded in 1979 and is headquartered in Sidoarjo, Indonesia.
General.Address: Jl. Desa Keboharan Km 26, Sidoarjo, Indonesia, 61262
